name: Pick a god (and pray)
description:
WARNING: Play on fullscreen because we don't know how to fix the screen resolution problem (sorry...)

Welcome, human person!

You have died and... gone to the andean underworld?

Well, that's unexpected, but not as much as being rejected and sent back by the god of death.

Dead and without anywhere to go, you end up climbing the closest mountain only to find three handsome men? That turn out to be... the god of creation, the actual sun and a sea monster?

... is this a caffeine induced hallucination?

Enjoy a historically inaccurate game about gods you probably never heard of before!

Pick a god! (and pray you're good enough)

Entry for the #ceviche-game-jam 2020 

Theme: Traditions (kind of...)

Made with Unity Adventure Creator

Team "Linkin Park Churrando Ratas":

  • Story: Anami & krepen
  • Art: krepen
  • Programming: Rusty & Oni giri
  • 3am shitposting: Anami & Rusty

Rat fight background music by Linkin Park
